articles.title: Czech 'I Miss You' Phrases: Express Your Longing Tenderly
articles.content:
Czech offers tender, sincere ways to express how much you miss your partner. These phrases capture the depth of longing with Slavic warmth and poetic sensibility.

## The Czech Heart of Longing

Czech speakers express missing someone (*st√Ωskat se* or *chybƒõt*) with genuine emotional depth. The language offers multiple ways to convey absence‚Äîfrom gentle missing to deep yearning.

## Essential 'I Miss You' Phrases

### Tender Expressions

**St√Ωsk√° se mi po tobƒõ**
*(Stees-ka se mi po to-bye)*
*I miss you* (literally: "It yearns in me for you")

The classic Czech expression‚Äîimpersonal construction that emphasizes the feeling.

**Moc se mi po tobƒõ st√Ωsk√°**
*(Mots se mi po to-bye stees-ka)*
*I miss you very much*

Intensifying with *moc* (very much).

**Chyb√≠≈° mi**
*(Khi-beesh mi)*
*You're missing from me* / *I miss you*

Simpler construction‚Äîyou are absent from their life.

### Deep Longing

**Nem≈Ø≈æu p≈ôestat myslet na tebe**
*(Ne-moo-zhu przhe-stat mis-let na te-be)*
*I can't stop thinking about you*

They occupy your thoughts completely.

**Ka≈æd√Ω den bez tebe je tƒõ≈æk√Ω**
*(Kazh-dee den bez te-be ye tyezh-kee)*
*Every day without you is hard*

Their absence makes daily life more difficult.

**Moje srdce po tobƒõ tou≈æ√≠**
*(Mo-ye srd-tse po to-bye tow-zhee)*
*My heart yearns for you*

*Tou≈æit* expresses deep, aching desire.

### Romantic Yearning

**Poƒç√≠t√°m dny do na≈°eho setk√°n√≠**
*(Po-chee-tam dni do na-she-ho set-ka-nee)*
*I'm counting the days until we meet*

Anticipation measured in eager waiting.

**Bez tebe je v≈°echno pr√°zdn√©**
*(Bez te-be ye vshekh-no prazd-ne)*
*Without you everything is empty*

Their presence gives meaning to everything.

**Chci b√Ωt v tv√©m n√°ruƒç√≠**
*(Khtsi beet v tvem na-ru-chi)*
*I want to be in your embrace*

Physical closeness is what you crave.

### Heartfelt Messages

**Jsi po≈ô√°d v m√Ωch my≈°lenk√°ch**
*(Ysi po-rzhad v meekh mi-shlen-kakh)*
*You're always in my thoughts*

Constant mental presence.

**P≈ô√°l/a bych si, abys tu byl/a**
*(Przhal/a bikh si, a-bis tu bil/a)*
*I wish you were here*

Use masculine or feminine forms as appropriate.

**Kdy≈æ tu nejsi, nƒõco chyb√≠**
*(Gdizh tu ney-si, nye-tso khi-bee)*
*When you're not here, something is missing*

An indefinable void in their absence.

## Czech Terms of Endearment

- **L√°sko** (las-ko) ‚Äî Love
- **Mil√°ƒçku** (mi-lach-ku) ‚Äî Darling
- **Zlat√≠ƒçko** (zla-teech-ko) ‚Äî Golden one
- **Srd√≠ƒçko** (sr-deech-ko) ‚Äî Little heart

## Cultural Notes

**Sincerity valued**: Czechs appreciate genuine emotional expression.

**Poetic tradition**: Czech has beautiful traditions of romantic poetry.

**Understatement**: Czechs may express less dramatically but feel deeply.

## Making It Personal

Czech pronunciation is challenging but your effort will be treasured. The emotion behind your words matters most.

Your Czech-speaking partner will be touched by your attempts to express longing in their language.

articles.title: Udtryk F√∏lelser p√• Engelsk: Komplet Guide for Par
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

At kunne udtrykke dine f√∏lelser p√• din partners sprog skaber en unik forbindelse. N√•r du fort√¶ller din partner hvordan du har det p√• engelsk, viser du en s√•rbarhed der styrker jeres forhold. Denne guide giver dig ordforr√•det til at dele gl√¶de, sorg, k√¶rlighed og alt derimellem. Kombiner dette med vores [engelske romantiske fraser](/learn/da/en/english-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion/).

<PhraseOfDay
  word="I feel happy"
  translation="Jeg f√∏ler mig glad"
  pronunciation="ai fiil ha-pi"
  context="En vigtig f√∏lelsesudtryk p√• engelsk"
/>

## Positive F√∏lelser

Lad os starte med de gode f√∏lelser:

<VocabCard
  word="I'm happy"
  translation="Jeg er lykkelig"
  pronunciation="aim ha-pi"
  example="I'm so happy with you."
/>

### Gl√¶de og Lykke

| Engelsk | Dansk | Udtale |
|---------|-------|--------|
| **I'm happy** | Jeg er lykkelig | aim ha-pi |
| **I'm filled with joy** | Jeg er fyldt med gl√¶de | aim fild wid joi |
| **I'm excited** | Jeg er begejstret | aim ek-sai-ted |
| **I'm grateful** | Jeg er taknemmelig | aim grei-ful |
| **I'm content** | Jeg er tilfreds | aim kon-tent |

### K√¶rlighed og Hengivenhed

- **I'm in love** (Jeg er forelsket) - "aim in lav"
- **I adore you** (Jeg tilbeder dig) - "ai uh-dor juu"
- **I'm crazy about you** (Jeg er vild med dig) - "aim krei-zi uh-baut juu"
- **You mean everything to me** (Du betyder alt for mig) - "juu miin ev-ri-thing"

<CultureTip flag="üá¨üáß" title="F√∏lelseskultur">
Engl√¶ndere udtrykker ofte f√∏lelser mere subtilt. 'I'm quite happy' kan betyde 'jeg er meget glad'.
</CultureTip>

## Negative F√∏lelser

Det er vigtigt at kunne dele de sv√¶re f√∏lelser:

<VocabCard
  word="I'm sad"
  translation="Jeg er trist"
  pronunciation="aim sad"
  example="I'm feeling sad today."
/>

### Tristhed og Sorg

| Engelsk | Dansk | Udtale |
|---------|-------|--------|
| **I'm sad** | Jeg er trist | aim sad |
| **I'm upset** | Jeg er ked af det | aim up-set |
| **I'm disappointed** | Jeg er skuffet | aim dis-uh-poin-ted |
| **I'm hurt** | Jeg er s√•ret | aim hart |
| **I feel lonely** | Jeg f√∏ler mig ensom | ai fiil loun-li |

### Frustrationer

- **I'm frustrated** (Jeg er frustreret) - "aim frus-trei-ted"
- **I'm stressed** (Jeg er stresset) - "aim strest"
- **I'm worried** (Jeg er bekymret) - "aim wu-riid"
- **I'm overwhelmed** (Jeg er overv√¶ldet) - "aim ou-vur-welmd"

## Fysiske Fornemmelser

| Engelsk | Dansk | Udtale |
|---------|-------|--------|
| **I'm tired** | Jeg er tr√¶t | aim tai-urd |
| **I'm full of energy** | Jeg er fuld af energi | aim ful ov e-nur-ji |
| **I'm relaxed** | Jeg er afslappet | aim ri-lakst |
| **I feel sick** | Jeg har det d√•rligt | ai fiil sik |

## Sp√∏rge til Partnerens F√∏lelser

<VocabCard
  word="How are you feeling?"
  translation="Hvordan har du det?"
  pronunciation="hau ar juu fii-ling?"
  example="How are you feeling today?"
/>

- **What's wrong?** (Hvad er der galt?) - "wots rong?"
- **Tell me how you feel** (Fort√¶l mig hvad du f√∏ler) - "tel mi hau juu fiil"
- **Can I help?** (Kan jeg hj√¶lpe?) - "kan ai help?"
- **I'm here for you** (Jeg er her for dig) - "aim hiir for juu"

<CultureTip flag="üá¨üáß" title="At dele f√∏lelser">
Engl√¶ndere kan v√¶re tilbageholdende med f√∏lelser. Giv din partner tid og rum.
</CultureTip>

## Reagere p√• Partnerens F√∏lelser

### St√∏ttende Svar
- **I understand** (Jeg forst√•r)
- **I'm sorry to hear that** (Det er jeg ked af at h√∏re)
- **You're not alone** (Du er ikke alene)
- **We'll get through this together** (Vi klarer det sammen)

### Tr√∏stende Ord
- **It will be alright** (Det bliver okay)
- **I love you** (Jeg elsker dig)
- **Come, let me hold you** (Kom, lad mig holde dig)
- **You're strong** (Du er st√¶rk)

## "Du G√∏r Mig..." Fraser

| Engelsk | Dansk |
|---------|-------|
| **You make me happy** | Du g√∏r mig lykkelig |
| **You make me smile** | Du f√•r mig til at smile |
| **You make me laugh** | Du f√•r mig til at grine |
| **You make me feel special** | Du f√•r mig til at f√∏le mig speciel |

## Tips til Emotionel Kommunikation

1. **Brug "jeg"-s√¶tninger** - "Jeg f√∏ler..." i stedet for "Du g√∏r mig..."
2. **V√¶r specifik** - Fort√¶l pr√¶cis hvad du f√∏ler
3. **Accepter alle f√∏lelser** - Der er ingen forkerte f√∏lelser
4. **Lyt aktivt** - Vis forst√•else med nikke og √∏jenkontakt

For flere m√•der at udtrykke k√¶rlighed, se [hvordan man siger jeg elsker dig p√• engelsk](/learn/da/en/english-how-to-say-i-love-you/).

At mestre det emotionelle ordforr√•d p√• engelsk √•bner for dybere samtaler med din partner.

<CTA />

articles.title: Expresii despre Gelozie »ôi √éncredere √Æn Cuplu √Æn TurcƒÉ
articles.content:
Gelozia este o emo»õie universalƒÉ care poate apƒÉrea √Æn orice rela»õie. A »ôti cum sƒÉ discu»õi despre aceste sentimente poate transforma tensiunea √Æn oportunitate de conectare.

## Expresii pentru a Discuta despre Gelozie

### Recunoa»ôterea Sentimentelor

√énva»õƒÉ sƒÉ-»õi exprimi sentimentele √Æntr-un mod sƒÉnƒÉtos, fƒÉrƒÉ acuza»õii.

### Construirea √éncrederii

Frazele de reasigurare sunt esen»õiale pentru o rela»õie sƒÉnƒÉtoasƒÉ.

### RƒÉspunsuri la Gelozie

C√¢nd partenerul exprimƒÉ gelozie, valideazƒÉ sentimentele »ôi oferƒÉ reasigurare.

## Sfaturi Practice

1. **Comunicare deschisƒÉ** - Vorbe»ôte despre sentimente
2. **Ascultare activƒÉ** - √én»õelege perspectiva partenerului
3. **EvitƒÉ acuza»õiile** - Folose»ôte eu √Æn loc de tu
4. **Transparen»õƒÉ** - Fi»õi deschi»ôi
5. **Respect reciproc** - Gelozia nu justificƒÉ controlul

## Concluzie

Gelozia poate fi gestionatƒÉ sƒÉnƒÉtos prin comunicare »ôi √Æncredere reciprocƒÉ.

sections: ## Expresii pentru a Discuta despre Gelozie

articles.title: Fraze Romantice Poloneze pentru Cupluri: Expresii pentru Orice Ocazie
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

PolonƒÉ este o limbƒÉ incredibil de expresivƒÉ »ôi romanticƒÉ. Acest ghid con»õine frazele de care ai nevoie pentru fiecare moment special cu partenerul tƒÉu polonez.

## Fraza Zilei

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Sprawiasz, ze jestem szczesliwa/szczesliwy"
  translation="Ma faci fericita/fericit"
  pronunciation="SPRA-vyash zhe YES-tem shchen-SHLI-va/shchen-SHLI-vy"
  context="O frazƒÉ simplƒÉ dar puternica pentru a-ti exprima sentimentele."
/>

## Declaratii de Dragoste

<VocabCard
  word="Kocham Cie bardziej niz cokolwiek na swiecie"
  translation="Te iubesc mai mult decat orice pe lume"
  pronunciation="KO-ham chie BAR-djey nizh tso-KOL-viek na SHVIE-chie"
  example="Wiesz dobrze - kocham Cie bardziej niz cokolwiek na swiecie."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Moje serce nalezy do Ciebie"
  translation="Inima mea √Æ»õi apar»õine"
  pronunciation="MO-ye SER-tse na-LE-zhy do CHIE-bie"
  example="Od dnia kiedy sie poznalismy, moje serce nalezy do Ciebie."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Jestes jedyna/jedyny dla mnie"
  translation="Esti singura/singurul pentru mine"
  pronunciation="YES-tesh ye-DY-na/ye-DY-ny dla mnie"
  example="Nie ma nikogo innego - jestes jedyna dla mnie."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Chce byc z Toba na zawsze"
  translation="Vreau sƒÉ fiu cu tine pentru totdeauna"
  pronunciation="htse bych z TO-bom na ZAV-she"
  example="Kocham Cie i chce byc z Toba na zawsze."
/>

<CultureTip title="Romantismul Polonez" flag="üáµüá±">
Polonezii au o bogatƒÉ traditie romanticƒÉ, de la poezia lui Adam Mickiewicz la muzica lui Chopin. Expresiile poetice sunt apreciate »ôi folosite natural in viata de zi cu zi.
</CultureTip>

## Complimente Romantice

<VocabCard
  word="Jestes najpiekniejsza na swiecie"
  translation="Esti cea mai frumoasƒÉ din lume"
  pronunciation="YES-tesh nay-pienk-NYEY-sha na SHVIE-chie"
  example="Dla mnie jestes najpiekniejsza na swiecie."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Masz najslodsze oczy"
  translation="Ai cei mai dulci ochi"
  pronunciation="mash nay-SWOD-she O-chy"
  example="Moglbym patrzec w Twoje oczy caly dzien."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Twoj usmiech rozswietla moje zycie"
  translation="Zambetul tƒÉu imi lumineaza viata"
  pronunciation="tvuy U-shmyeh roz-SHVYET-la MO-ye ZHY-chie"
  example="Za kazdym razem gdy sie usmiechasz, rozswietlasz moje zycie."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Jestes idealna/idealny taka/taki jaka/jaki jestes"
  translation="Esti perfecta/perfect asa cum esti"
  pronunciation="YES-tesh i-de-AL-na/i-de-AL-ny..."
  example="Nie zmieniaj sie nigdy - jestes idealna taka jaka jestes."
/>

## Expresii de Dor »ôi Lipsa

<VocabCard
  word="Bardzo za Toba tesknie"
  translation="Imi e foarte dor de tine"
  pronunciation="BAR-dzo za TO-bom TENSK-nie"
  example="Kiedy nie ma Cie obok, bardzo za Toba tesknie."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Mysle o Tobie caly czas"
  translation="Ma g√¢ndesc la tine tot timpul"
  pronunciation="MY-shle o TO-bie TSA-wy chas"
  example="Nawet gdy pracuje, mysle o Tobie caly czas."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Nie moge sie doczekac, az Cie zobacze"
  translation="Abia astept sƒÉ te vad"
  pronunciation="nie MO-ge shie do-CHE-kach azh chie zo-BA-che"
  example="Nie moge sie doczekac, az Cie zobacze wieczorem!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Brakuje mi Ciebie"
  translation="Imi lipsesti"
  pronunciation="bra-KU-ye mi CHIE-bie"
  example="Wszystko wydaje sie puste - brakuje mi Ciebie."
/>

## Pentru Momente Speciale

### Aniversari

<VocabCard
  word="Wszystkiego najlepszego z okazji rocznicy"
  translation="La multi ani de aniversare"
  pronunciation="vshyst-KIE-go nay-LEP-she-go z o-KA-zyi roch-NI-tsy"
  example="Wszystkiego najlepszego z okazji rocznicy, kochanie!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Kolejny rok z Toba to dar"
  translation="Inca un an cu tine e un dar"
  pronunciation="ko-LEY-ny rok z TO-bom to dar"
  example="Kolejny rok z Toba to dar, za ktory jestem wdzieczna."
/>

### Cerere in Casatorie

<VocabCard
  word="Czy wyjdziesz za mnie?"
  translation="Vrei sƒÉ te casatoresti cu mine?"
  pronunciation="chy VYY-djesh za mnie"
  example="Kocham Cie - czy wyjdziesz za mnie?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Czy zostaniesz moja zona/moim mezem?"
  translation="Vrei sƒÉ fii sotia mea/sotul meu?"
  pronunciation="chy zo-STA-niesh MO-ya ZHO-nom / MO-im MEN-zhem"
  example="Czy zostaniesz moja zona na cale zycie?"
/>

<CultureTip title="Propuneri Poloneze" flag="üáµüá±">
In Polonia, propunerile sunt de obicei intime »ôi sincere. Inelul de logodna este traditional, iar momentul este ales cu grija. Polonezii pre»õuiesc sinceritatea deasupra spectacolului.
</CultureTip>

## Fraze de Sustinere

<VocabCard
  word="Zawsze jestem tu dla Ciebie"
  translation="Sunt mereu aici pentru tine"
  pronunciation="ZAV-she YES-tem tu dla CHIE-bie"
  example="Bez wzgledu na wszystko, zawsze jestem tu dla Ciebie."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Przejdziemy przez to razem"
  translation="O sƒÉ trecem prin asta impreuna"
  pronunciation="pshey-DJIE-my pshezh to RA-zem"
  example="To trudne, ale przejdziemy przez to razem."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Wierze w Ciebie"
  translation="Cred in tine"
  pronunciation="VYE-zhe v CHIE-bie"
  example="Dasz rade - wierze w Ciebie!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Jestem z Ciebie dumna/dumny"
  translation="Sunt mandra/mandru de tine"
  pronunciation="YES-tem z CHIE-bie DUM-na/DUM-ny"
  example="Uda≈Ço Ci sie fantastycznie! Jestem z Ciebie dumna."
/>

## Fraze pentru Rezolvarea Conflictelor

<VocabCard
  word="Przepraszam"
  translation="Imi pare rau"
  pronunciation="pshe-PRA-sham"
  example="Przepraszam - mialas/mia≈Çes racje."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Prosze, wybacz mi"
  translation="Te rog sƒÉ ma ierti"
  pronunciation="PRO-she VY-bach mi"
  example="Prosze, wybacz mi. Nie chcia≈Çam/chcia≈Çem."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Porozmawiajmy o tym"
  translation="Hai sƒÉ vorbim despre asta"
  pronunciation="po-roz-ma-VYAY-my o tym"
  example="Chce Cie lepiej zrozumiec. Porozmawiajmy o tym."
/>

## Referinta Rapida: Fraze Esentiale

| Romana | PolonƒÉ | Pronuntie |
|--------|--------|-----------|
| Te iubesc | Kocham Cie | KO-ham chie |
| Ma faci fericit | Sprawiasz ze jestem szczesliwy | SPRA-vyash zhe... |
| Imi e dor de tine | Tesknie za Toba | TENSK-nie za TO-bom |
| Esti frumoasƒÉ | Jestes piekna | YES-tesh PIENK-na |
| Sunt mandru de tine | Jestem z Ciebie dumny | YES-tem z CHIE-bie DUM-ny |
| Imi pare rau | Przepraszam | pshe-PRA-sham |
| Te iert | Wybaczam Ci | vy-BA-cham chi |

<CTA
  text="Gata sƒÉ stƒÉp√¢ne»ôti polonezƒÉ cu partenerul tƒÉu? ExerseazƒÉ cu chat vocal AI, salveazƒÉ fraze √Æn Love Log, iar partenerul tƒÉu poate fi tutore. Perfect pentru cupluri bilingve!"
  buttonText="√éncepe Acum"
/>

articles.title: Saudacoes e Despedidas em Alemao para Casais
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

As saudacoes alemas tem regras claras sobre formalidade e informalidade. Dominar essas diferencas vai ajudar voces a navegarem qualquer situacao social na Alemanha, Austria ou Suica.

## Saudacoes Formais

<VocabCard
  word="Guten Morgen"
  translation="Bom dia (ate ~10h)"
  pronunciation="[GU-ten MOR-gen]"
  example="Guten Morgen, Herr Muller! Wie geht es Ihnen?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Guten Tag"
  translation="Bom dia / Boa tarde"
  pronunciation="[GU-ten TAK]"
  example="Guten Tag! Ich habe einen Termin."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Guten Abend"
  translation="Boa noite (ao chegar)"
  pronunciation="[GU-ten A-bent]"
  example="Guten Abend! Ein Tisch fur zwei, bitte."
/>

<CultureTip title="Formalidade Alema" flag="üá©üá™">
Use "Sie" (formal) com desconhecidos, pessoas mais velhas, em contextos profissionais. Troque para "du" (informal) apenas quando oferecido. Isso se chama "duzen" e e um sinal de proximidade.
</CultureTip>

## Saudacoes Informais

<VocabCard
  word="Hallo"
  translation="Oi / Ola"
  pronunciation="[HA-lo]"
  example="Hallo Schatz! Wie war dein Tag?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Hi"
  translation="Oi (muito informal)"
  pronunciation="[hai]"
  example="Hi! Alles klar?"
/>

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Na?"
  translation="E ai? / Oi"
  pronunciation="[na]"
  context="Saudacao super casual entre pessoas muito proximas"
/>

## Variacoes Regionais

<VocabCard
  word="Gruss Gott"
  translation="Ola (sul da Alemanha, Austria)"
  pronunciation="[grus GOT]"
  example="Gruss Gott! Schon, Sie kennenzulernen."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Servus"
  translation="Oi / Tchau (Bavaria, Austria)"
  pronunciation="[ZER-vus]"
  example="Servus! Wie geht's dir?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Moin / Moin Moin"
  translation="Oi (norte da Alemanha)"
  pronunciation="[moin]"
  example="Moin! Schones Wetter heute, oder?"
/>

<CultureTip title="Norte vs. Sul" flag="üá©üá™">
No norte da Alemanha, "Moin" e usado o dia todo, nao so de manha! No sul e na Austria, "Gruss Gott" e a saudacao padrao formal. "Servus" funciona tanto para oi quanto para tchau.
</CultureTip>

## Perguntando Como Esta

<VocabCard
  word="Wie geht es Ihnen?"
  translation="Como o senhor/a senhora esta? (formal)"
  pronunciation="[vi GEET es I-nen]"
  example="Guten Tag! Wie geht es Ihnen?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Wie geht's dir?"
  translation="Como voce esta? (informal)"
  pronunciation="[vi GEETS dir]"
  example="Hey Schatz, wie geht's dir heute?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Alles klar?"
  translation="Tudo bem?"
  pronunciation="[A-les KLAR]"
  example="Hi! Alles klar bei dir?"
/>

## Despedidas Formais

<VocabCard
  word="Auf Wiedersehen"
  translation="Ate logo / Adeus"
  pronunciation="[auf VI-der-ze-en]"
  example="Danke fur alles. Auf Wiedersehen!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Auf Wiederhoren"
  translation="Ate logo (ao telefone)"
  pronunciation="[auf VI-der-ho-ren]"
  example="Danke fur den Anruf. Auf Wiederhoren!"
/>

## Despedidas Informais

<VocabCard
  word="Tschuss"
  translation="Tchau"
  pronunciation="[CHUS]"
  example="Tschuss! Bis morgen!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Bis bald"
  translation="Ate logo"
  pronunciation="[bis BALT]"
  example="Das war schon. Bis bald!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Bis spater"
  translation="Ate mais tarde"
  pronunciation="[bis SHPE-ter]"
  example="Ich muss los. Bis spater, Schatz!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Mach's gut"
  translation="Se cuida / Fica bem"
  pronunciation="[machs GUT]"
  example="Mach's gut! Ruf mich an, wenn du ankommst."
/>

## Saudacoes Romanticas para Casais

<VocabCard
  word="Guten Morgen, mein Schatz"
  translation="Bom dia, meu amor"
  pronunciation="[GU-ten MOR-gen main SHATS]"
  example="Guten Morgen, mein Schatz! Kaffee ist fertig."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Schlaf gut, Liebling"
  translation="Durma bem, querido(a)"
  pronunciation="[shlaf GUT LEEP-ling]"
  example="Schlaf gut, Liebling. Ich liebe dich."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Traume sus"
  translation="Sonhe com os anjinhos (lit.: sonhe doce)"
  pronunciation="[TROI-me zus]"
  example="Gute Nacht! Traume sus, mein Engel."
/>

## Pratica Diaria

### Manha
1. "Guten Morgen, Schatz!"
2. "Hast du gut geschlafen?"
3. "Bis spater!" ao sair

### Reencontro
1. "Hallo, Liebling!"
2. "Wie war dein Tag?"
3. "Ich hab dich vermisst!"

### Noite
1. "Gute Nacht, mein Schatz"
2. "Schlaf gut!"
3. "Ich liebe dich. Traume sus!"
